text: Thank you, brave soldiers from Haki.
Oh my god it's Queen Elyne herself! Your Highness! I bow to thee!
Uh... Your Highness! We came to investigate what happened to our aid, and we found out that it was pillaged by these Skathian barbars!
Yes, they came to pillage us as you have seen with your very eyes. You've got to help us!
Yes, Your Highness! Anything for you!
We would be more than honored! What can we do to help?
These troops have been sent by Queen Celes of Skathi. She must be stopped at all costs, she is a horrible dictator who knows no compassion, even her own people are suffering under her!
That's horrible! We're going to do something about it, right Kris?
Yes, we will! Just please tell us what to do, Your Majesty!

Eastward, past the desert, the Skathians have built a giant Crystal shrine. Our royal research team has found that this crystal is housing a magical weapon, designed to destroy our entire Capital! Please, you've got to put a stop to these monsters, break that Crystal!
This is my chance, I'm going to get my revenge for what they did to me.
You can count on us, Your Majesty! We will destroy that crystal and anybody who tries to stop us!
So these are those troops from Skathi that pillaged our caravan. Are they... Are they attacking Tyrmyr?
Looks like it! It’s time to put a stop to them! Maybe if we help the Capital we will be thanked by Queen Elyne herself!
Wow, do you think we could actually see her in person?
If we save the day, we just might!
That would be so exciting! I've always dreamed of meeting a Royal!
...Whatever guys, let’s go kick some Skathian ass!
